name: Frostpunk: Game of the Year edition
name_original: Frostpunk: Game of the Year edition
description:
Frostpunk: Game of the Year edition is a strategy game developed by 11 Bit Studios. It was originally released in 2019. It was published by 11 bit studios. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Frostpunk: Game of the Year edition on PC.
